viaggio.title: The honeymoon
viaggio.p1: We chose to spend our honeymoon in Japan!
viaggio.p2: If you are happy for us and want to help us with the trip or if you just want to send us the farest away for a while, here you can get how to do it

contatti.title: Contact us
contatti.p1: Do you have questions, suggestions or you need to contact us? Do you want to say hi or send us your wishes?
